Add/Replace/Delete.Description: The ADD/Delete/Replace modifiers are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

Aggr Rule.Description: This attribute specifies the user defined aggregations that will be precomputed from the Rule Set in which it is specified.

Parameters.Keywords: All True, AND, Any True, OR

Aggr Rule.Name: Aggr Rule

Break On.Description: Break On attribute allows you to control the execution flow after executing the current rule. It provides vertical flow control for evaluating the rules. If this attribute is not specified, it is assumed that execution should never break.
Break On.Name: Break On

Local Formula.Description: This is used to specify a local formula within the Rule Set.
Local Formula.Name: Local Formula

Name Map.Description: Specifies mapping of a rule to a specific rule description.
Name Map.Name: Name Map

NameSet.Description: This attribute specifies Name Set for mapping the rules to their respective descriptions. All strings from the specified Name Set are referred to as rule descriptions.
NameSet.Name: NameSet

Rule.Description: This attribute specifies a rule for the current Rule Set. It can be repeated for specifying more rules.
Rule.Name: Rule

Rule Set.Description: Specifies a single next dimensional Rule Set. This can be repeated to specify more than one Rule Set as next dimension.
Rule Set.Name: Rule Set

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use

Walk On.Description: Walk On condition controls the hierarchical execution flow after a rule is executed. If not specified, it is assumed that next dimension evaluation should always be done.
Walk On.Name: Walk On
